instruction: Explain the historical significance of the Gorkha Kingdom in Roman Nepali.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Mount Everest' ko barema jankari deu.
output: Mount Everest, Sagarmatha pani bhanincha, world ko highest mountain ho. Yo Nepal ra China ko border ma chha. Everest ko height 8,848.86 meters chha. Sir Edmund Hillary ra Tenzing Norgay Sherpa le 1953 ma first successful summit gareka thiye.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Dashain' festival ko barema 3 ota kura lekh.
output: 1. Dashain Nepal ko sabai bhanda important festival ho. 2. Yo festival 15 days samma manaincha. 3. Dashain ma family haru bhetghat garne, jamara ra tika lagaune, ra goat ko meat khane chalan chha.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Nepal ko population' ko barema jankari deu.
output: Nepal ko population approximately 30 million chha. Population growth rate 1.85% chha. Kathmandu valley ma dherai population chha. Nepal ma 125 jati ethnic groups chhan.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Nepali currency' ko barema lekha.
output: Nepal ko currency Nepalese Rupee (NPR) ho. 1 Rupee ma 100 paisa huncha. Nepal Rastra Bank le currency manage garcha. Nepali Rupee Indian Rupee sanga fixed exchange rate ma chha.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Nepal ko national bird' ko barema lekha.
output: Nepal ko national bird 'Himalayan Monal' ho. Yo bird colorful plumage ko huncha. Himalayan Monal lai 'Danphe' pani bhanincha. Yo bird high altitude area ma payincha.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Nepal ko national flower' ko barema lekha.
output: Nepal ko national flower 'Rhododendron' ho. Yo flower lai 'Lali Gurans' pani bhanincha. Rhododendron Himalaya region ma dherai payincha. Yo flower red color ko huncha.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Nepal ko national animal' ko barema lekha.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Nepal ko national game' ko barema lekha.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Nepal ko national language' ko barema lekha.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Nepal ko national flag' ko barema lekha.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Nepal ko national emblem' ko barema lekha.
output: Nepal ko national emblem ma Mount Everest, green hills, yellow color ko field, ra male ra female hands chhan. Emblem ma 'Janani Janmabhoomischa Swargadapi Gariyasi' lekheko chha. Yo emblem Nepal ko unity ra diversity ko pratik ho.

instruction: Nepali ma 'Nepal ko national calendar' ko barema lekha.
